ul.li: Standard player functions: repeat, shuffle, intro, fast forward/rewind, mute, volume, position in track...
Push : Add track(s) in the player queue
Recursive play/repeat/shuffle/push in directories/sub-directories or by style/author/albums...
Intro from a track % and with a specified length
Bestof magic function : play your favorite tracks
Instant search box : perform instant search on style/author/track name... when typing
Dynamic playlist creation by drag and drop
Physical / logical separation : you can navigate into physical directories and files or into logical styles, authors, albums, tracks
Indexing method : Jajuk doesn't read id3 tags or directory structure at each startup but save them in a XML database. It allows a fast startup even for very large collections
Non-mounted devices support : with jajuk, you can 'see' tracks on unmounted devices ( CDs for exemple ). So you get a full view of your collection at any time
Multilanguage ( English and French langpacks are already provided )
Fast collection builder : a cd scanner allows you to create a jajuk collection of tens of CDs in only few minutes
Eclipse-like graphical interface : Jajuk windows are divided into perspectives and views for a good functionnal separation. Views can be hidden or resized
Startup track: none, last one, specified, shuffle
Meta-properties support : you will be able to create a property of your own ( a rate or localisation system for exemple ) that you can set on tracks or any item
